channel.title: Pitch samples without changing the length?
channel.description: So I loaded in a 10 second song sample, and I pitched it up a couple of octaves, but the tempo of the sample song increased beyond that of my track. Is there a way to prevent this from happening?

item.title: Pitch samples without changing the length?
item.dc:creator: WAVZ
item.source: Pitch samples without changing the length?

item.title: Pitch samples without changing the length?
item.dc:creator: WAVZ
item.description:
I’m currently doing that in logic- I just figured I stumbled upon a glitch or something, while trying it on auxy

Read full topic
item.source: Pitch samples without changing the length?

item.title: Pitch samples without changing the length?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Currently, no. Pitch alters playback speed. You’re looking for time stretching, which isn’t in Auxy at the moment

Read full topic
item.source: Pitch samples without changing the length?

item.title: Pitch samples without changing the length?
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
You can pitch it using another software that won’t change speed
